QAPair.Question: What is (are) Multiple sclerosis - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: Your health care provider has told you that you have multiple sclerosis ( MS ). This disease affects the brain and spinal cord (central nervous system). At home follow your provider's instructions on self-care. Use the information below as a reminder.

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Multiple sclerosis - discharge ?
